rule.control: Reporting entities MUST reference only one xsd entry point ("module", link:schemaRef element), as specified in the applicable taxonomy, per XBRL report. [SBR13, p. 6]
he context referenced by the filing indicator elements MUST NOT contain xbrli:segment or xbrli:scenario elements.
XBRL reports MUST contain only one filing indicator element for a given reporting unit ("template").
